div.p: Ok, we're going to try to add two numbers together,
these numbers are going to be something like this; 486 plus 123, pretty simple.
First of all we start with the units column, so we go six and three is nine.
Now that produces a complication, we can’t put ten in here so we put a zero there
and we carry the one over to the next column.
So then we’ve got four plus one is five plus that one we carried,
